      • getInstance

      • createNotification

        @Deprecated
public android.app.Notification createNotification(AppboyConfigurationProvider appConfigurationProvider,
                                                               android.content.Context context,
                                                               android.os.Bundle notificationExtras,
                                                               android.os.Bundle appboyExtras)
        Deprecated. 
        Description copied from interface: IAppboyNotificationFactory
        Note that this method is only called if IAppboyNotificationFactory.createNotification(BrazeNotificationPayload) returns null as it is the preferred method moving forward.
        Specified by:
        createNotification in interface IAppboyNotificationFactory
        Parameters:
        appConfigurationProvider - Braze app configuration
        context - Application context
        notificationExtras - the original Bundle object passed to Braze by fcm/adm, potentially with additions or modifications.
        appboyExtras - a Bundle object containing 'extra' key value pairs defined by the client
        Returns:
        a Notification object to be delivered to the notification area, or null if delivery to the notification center will be handled manually.
        See Also:
        IAppboyNotificationFactory.createNotification(BrazeNotificationPayload)

      • createNotification

        public android.app.Notification createNotification(BrazeNotificationPayload payload)
        Creates the rich notification. The notification content varies based on the Android version on the device, but each notification can contain an icon, image, title, and content. Opening a notification from the notification center triggers a broadcast message to be sent. The broadcast message action is .intent.APPBOY_NOTIFICATION_OPENED.
        Specified by:
        createNotification in interface IAppboyNotificationFactory
        Parameters:
        payload - A convenience wrapper object around the Braze notification payload.
        Returns:
        a Notification object to be delivered to the notification area, or null if delivery to the notification center will be handled manually.

      • populateNotificationBuilder

        public NotificationCompat.Builder populateNotificationBuilder(AppboyConfigurationProvider appboyConfigurationProvider,
                                                              android.content.Context context,
                                                              android.os.Bundle notificationExtras,
                                                              android.os.Bundle appboyExtras)
        Equivalent to createNotification(BrazeNotificationPayload)

      • populateNotificationBuilder

        public static NotificationCompat.Builder populateNotificationBuilder(BrazeNotificationPayload payload)
        Returns a notification builder populated with all fields from the notification extras and Braze extras. To create a notification object, call `build()` on the returned builder instance.
